Articles.Content: LokenPlays has recently picked up streaming KSP. This British streamer is shooting for Twitch partnership, and we’re happy to highlight his stream. Watch directly from the video or follow the link to join his chat: [http://goo.gl/8sSE5J]([http://goo.gl/8sSE5J](https://goo.gl/8sSE5J)
Always good to see new victims streamers.
